title: I hate league
body: LEAGUE WTF. Thx for ruining my experience because i disconnect every 5 mins and then i wait 20 minutes before a new game. I officially hate this game. Fix this.

replies.body: That's a pretty big pain to deal with I'm sure, it's pretty hard to play a good game if your network isn't letting you stay connected. You be able to stay in those matches by using a hardwired connection if you aren't already, but let's be safe and update some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well. Let me know if that doesn't seem to be helping!
